scripts.setup: npm run setup:rust && npm run setup:python && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:contracts
scripts.setup:rust: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install --force --locked cargo-contract
scripts.setup:python: cd ai-service && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: npm run build:substrate && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:substrate" "npm run start:ai" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:ai: cd ai-service && source venv/bin/activate && python app.py
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:ai && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:substrate && npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.health: npm run health:substrate && npm run health:ai && npm run health:frontend
scripts.health:substrate: curl -s http://localhost:9933/health || echo 'Substrate node not running'
scripts.health:ai: curl -s http://localhost:5000/health || echo 'AI service not running'
scripts.format: cd contracts && cargo fmt && cd ../ai-service && black . && cd ../frontend && npm run format
scripts.lint: cd contracts && cargo clippy && cd ../ai-service && flake8 . && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
